amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services School Violence Initiatives program by $5 million with offsets from the FBI Salaries and Expenses account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 10 printed in the Congressional Record. to increase funding for the Community Oriented Policing Services School Violence Initiatives program by $5 million with offsets from the FBI Salaries and Expenses account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A007) Failed by voice vote.
